comments: If a workbench advisor utilizes save and restore state and has an override of createWindowContents, an NPE is thrown on shutdown.  The NPE is thrown at line 1 of WorkbenchWindow.saveTrimState().  The problem is that defaultLayout is only initialized if WorkbenchWindow.createDefaultContents() is called.

Created an attachment (id=35301)
patch to the org.eclipse.ui.examples.rcp.browser to reproduce this bug

Mvm, even though this may be trim related the life-cycle issue it exposes is deeper (i.e. even when I'm done I'll be creating my 'defaultLayout' in the same code flow as we currently do).

I've added myself to the CC list though...

There is also an NPE when using intro mechanism. When you want to open/close the intromanager NPE are thrown when createDefaultContents() is overriden.

Here is the stack trace (I use 3.2M5 release).

Sorry UA I moved this before reading fully.  Matthew does this affect you or can you work around it?
This does affect us.  I don't know of a reasonable workaround at this point.
